revisions.rev:
{{Infobox software | name = Banshee | logo = [[File:Music-player-banshee.svg|48px|Banshee icon]] | screenshot = [[File:Banshee-2.0.png|250px]] | caption = Banshee's main interface in Ubuntu | developer = Aaron Bockover, Alexander Kojevnikov, Bertrand Lorentz, and Gabriel Burt | released = {{Start date|2005|2|17}}[http://www.banshee-project.org/History History - Banshee] | Preview Release = 1.3.1 | frequently_updated = yes | programming language = [[C Sharp (programming language)|C#]] ([[Gtk Sharp|Gtk#]]) | operating system = [[Linux]], [[Mac OS X]] (beta), [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] (alpha) | language = Multilingual | genre = [[Media player (application software)|Media player]] | license = [[MIT License|MIT]] | website = {{URL|banshee.fm}} }} '''Banshee''' is an [[Open source software|open-source]] [[Media player (application software)|media player]], called Sonance until 2005.[http://git.gnome.org/cgit/banshee/commit/?id=37cd82bf9c14d8217257ccd7901b985fed2518f9 Banshee rename git commit] Built upon [[Mono (software)|Mono]] and [[Gtk Sharp|Gtk#]], it uses the [[GStreamer]] multimedia platform for encoding and decoding various media formats, including [[Vorbis|Ogg Vorbis]], [[MP3]] and [[FLAC]]. Banshee can play and import audio [[Compact Disc|CD]]s and supports many portable media players, including [[Apple Inc.|Apple's]] [[iPod]], [[Android (operating system)|Android]] [[List of Android devices|devices]] and [[Creative Technology|Creative's]] [[Creative ZEN|ZEN]] players.http://library.gnome.org/users/banshee/1.8/sync.html.en Other features include [[Last.fm]] integration, album artwork fetching, smart playlists and podcast support. Banshee is released under the terms of the [[MIT License]]. Stable versions are available for many [[Linux]] [[Linux distribution | distributions]], as well as a beta preview for [[Mac OS X]] and an alpha preview for [[Windows]]. ==Plugins== Using a plugin-capable architecture, Banshee is highly extensible and customizable. Current stable plugins include: *Audioscrobbler: Adds the capability of reporting played songs to a user's [[Last.fm]] playlist, and play last.fm radio stations (user's library, tags, similar to, etc.). *[[Digital Audio Access Protocol|DAAP]] music sharing: Allows sharing of music libraries with [[iTunes]] and other DAAP-compatible music software. The current version of Banshee is only partially compatible with iTunes 7, allowing iTunes to open a Banshee library, but not vice-versa. *iPod manager: Allows the transferring of songs, videos, and album art to and from the device. *Metadata searcher using [[Musicbrainz]]: Automatically retrieves missing and supplementary metadata for library items, including album art. *Music Recommendations using [[Last.fm]]: Recommends music based on the currently playing song. *Mini-Mode plugin: Provides a small window with minimal playback controls and song information. *Multimedia keys support in [[GNOME]]: Banshee can be controlled via multimedia keys as configured through GNOME. *Notification Area Icon: Adds an icon to the notification area in GNOME. *Podcasting: Enables Banshee to subscribe to podcast feeds, which are updated on a regular basis. There is also a "Find new podcasts" feature which utilises [http://www.podcastalley.com Podcast Alley]. *Radio: Provides support for streaming Internet radio stations. ==Cross-platform support== Compared to the Linux builds, which have stable releases, the Mac OS X builds are considered beta quality, and Windows builds are alpha quality. The first alpha release of Banshee on Windows was Banshee 1.9.4, released on February 23, 2011.{{cite web |url=https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=641690#c4 |title=bgo#641690 Comment #4 |publisher=Gnome Bugzilla}}{{cite web |url=http://twitter.com/gabaug/status/39113347198758912 |title=Gabriel Burt, Twitter |publisher=Twitter}}{{cite web |url=http://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2011/02/banshee-alpha-for-windows-coming-next-week-and-other-banshee-news/ |title=OMG!Ubuntu! Article |publisher=OMG!Ubuntu!}} ==Release history== [http://banshee-project.org/download/archives/ Official Release History feature list]

| September 21, 2011 | * Support for the following Android devices: New Devices Supported: Motorola Atrix, Notion Ink Adam, Samsung Galaxy Ace, Samsung Galaxy S2, Xperia X12 * Support for the Barnes & Noble Nook * Support default internet radio stations * Various bug fixes (108 fixed since 2.0.0) |} {{col-2}} {| class="wikitable" |- ! Color ! Meaning |- | style="background:salmon;"| Red | Old release |- | style="background:#90ee90;"| Green | Current release |- | style="background:#ff8c00;"| Orange | Current development release |- | style="background:skyBlue;"| Blue | Future release |} {{col-end}} ==Helix Banshee== Helix Banshee was a version of Banshee, included in older versions of [[SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop]] and [[openSUSE]]. It was based upon the Banshee core, but with a plug-in to add support for the [[Helix (project)|Helix framework]] for playback and transcoding, in addition to GStreamer. ==See also== {{Portal|Free software}} *[[Amarok (audio)|Amarok]] *[[Exaile]] *[[Rhythmbox]] *[[Songbird (software)|Songbird]] *[[Comparison of audio player software|Comparison of media players]] *[[Free audio software]] *[[gtkpod]] *[[List of Linux audio software]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category|Banshee (media player)}} *{{Official website|http://banshee.fm/}} *[https://helix-banshee.helixcommunity.org/ Helix Banshee] {{media player (application software)}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Banshee (Media Player)}} [[Category:2005 software]] [[Category:Applications using D-Bus]] [[Category:Free audio software]] [[Category:Free media players]] [[Category:Free software programmed in C Sharp]] [[Category:GTK media players]] [[Category:IPod software]] [[Category:Jukebox-style media players]] [[Category:Linux media players]] [[Category:Mono project applications]] [[Category:Software using the MIT license]] [[ca:Banshee (reproductor d'Ã udio)]] [[de:Banshee (Medienspieler)]] [[es:Banshee (reproductor multimedia)]] [[fi:Banshee (mediasoitin)]] [[fr:Banshee (logiciel)]] [[it:Banshee (lettore musicale)]] [[hu:Banshee (mÃ©dialejÃ¡tszÃ³)]] [[nl:Banshee (audiospeler)]] [[ja:Banshee]] [[pl:Banshee (Linux)]] [[pt:Banshee (media player)]] [[ru:Banshee (Ð¼ÐµÐ´Ð¸Ð°Ð¿Ð»ÐµÐµÑ)]] [[uk:Banshee]] [[zh:Banshee]]
